Posts.Content: It will depend on how the chemo effects you, I couldn't work as it really knocked me off my feet. Hope it all goes well for you x
Posts.Title: Chemotherapy and work

Posts.Content: I felt exactly the same, I think this is very normal, I was diagnosed with breast cancer February 2012 and cried all the time mainly when I was on my own. You have to take each day as it comes and be strong, you will get through this, I became a grandma 1 week before I was diagnosed I focused on him and 2 years on he is still keeping me going. It's not easy and it will be a long road but just keep talking and find something positive to focus on x
Posts.Title: feel alone
